arcs.text: Grew up near the lumberyard, where woodwork was part of daily life.
Moved to Ponyville to be closer to the lumberyard and learn building.
First discovered a gift for building during a busy day at the lumberyard.
A small moment at the lumberyard sparked a lifelong love of building.
Faced a tough day when a storm cracked the promenade boards tested their patience.
Learned resilience after a storm cracked the promenade boards threatened the calm of the lumberyard.
Chose the path of builder after rebuilding a neighbor's porch.
Promised to serve Ponyville when rebuilding a neighbor's porch.
Now keeps the lumberyard welcoming by using building with care.
Helps Ponyville thrive by guiding others with woodwork.
Starts each morning by checking every beam for a steady fit.
Keeps a small habit: checking every beam for a steady fit, no matter how busy.
Shares a close bond with a trusted apprentice, who reminds them to stay gentle.
Finds comfort in a trusted apprentice, a steady companion through busy days.
Dreams of building a new community hall with warm timber arches for Ponyville.
Hopes to create a new community hall with warm timber arches so every pony can feel welcome.
